content.detailedDescription: 1.Stopped@ sign@agusta/comly st,phila.2.Deepwhoosh sound made me look left.3unknown light streak.4should report:not goodsighting,may be usefulto corromorate other report(note:ex member harrisburgskywatch)5.1 sec view,winked out
content.summary: Anomalous light,sound

content.detailedDescription: Man noticed a far-distant object low on the horizon with a wide orange contrail. he set up a 20-x surveyors transit and observed two objects, bothteardrop-shape; with contrails which were remindful of comets.  one objectappeared to descend, the other moved southward until both were lost from viewbeyond nearby trees.  this man is a decades long ufo watcher and amateurelectronics expert.
content.summary: Two tear-drop shaped objects seen near kewadin
Object in orbit detailized with 20x magnification

content.detailedDescription: Witness was at home when he saw an orange light in the southseastern sky.  atfirst he thought it could be a rocket, but then the light was stationary.  hevideotaped the object as it appeared to be stationary.  he videotaped it becausehe didnt know what it was.  the object appeared to be a circular orangelights.It remained stationary until the light just seemed to go out.  thishappened several times and at one point there were several lights in the sky.    two days later the wife and son went down the street to shop.  not even aquarter of a mile away.  they saw the same lights and drove in pursuit towardsthe direction of the lights to get a better look at it.  infomation on thissighting case #1-273.
content.summary: Orange lights in sky seen by witnesses
A v shaped formation of 5 orange lights.

content.detailedDescription: mufor alaska director received numerous e-mailsfrom mufon, ufo-bc, and other groups,in the last week concerning nightly reportsof many ufos, including a battleship sized black triangle, over seward, alaska. i have determined that all reports came from one person. i spent april 18,2001, from midnight till noon, looking.  i saw no ufo in the sky.  i willcontinue to investigate and report any developments, but so far no sighting hasbeen confirmed. no other witness has come forward.
content.summary: Seward ak lg triangle other ufos reports not confi

content.detailedDescription: i lived in the country at the time,and was on myway to work driving on a dirtroad. there are no lights and its always dark.I allof a sudden felt like i was being watched, so i shut off the car ,got out andlooked up not knowing why.Whati saw was huge at least the size of a footballfield, just sitting there, not one sound could be heard. it was black in colorwith very few dim red lights.It sat there about 2min, no i was not afraid, iactually felt at peace. the next thing i know it just took off, heading nw stillnot one sound coming fromit. it went so fast it was out of my sight in less than5seconds with huge red/orange tail trailing behind it. i was amazed, but it wasnot the last time i saw it. about 5yrs later i woke up outside in my yard5b5am5dand saw this huge object leaving me again only this time heading to the ne.Dont ask me how i got outside i simply dont know, but there was still calmnessinside of me and i felt sad at its leaving. after these events i would have somereal intense dreams, sometimes seeing other ships only smaller and mettalic incolor. i have never known what to make of this and some people i told justlaughed at me, which is why i have not pursued it until now, i just want to knowif i am the only one who has seen something this huge just hanging out in thesky.     thanks for your time                     kk
content.summary: Saw a ship the size of a football field flying ,tw

content.detailedDescription: Mans attention drawn skyward by dogs "funny" behavior.  observed dark bluecylinder cross the sky and out over lake huron until lost beyond nearbyobstructions after 15 seconds.  object traveled at nearly vertical (80-degree)attitude.  [note: identical sighting circumstances one year later.]  witnessvery familiar with ufo subject but considered credible.Uscg and selfridge ang contacted but unable to confirm air traffic due toabsence of specific date.  weather and satellite re-entry data obtained; noexplanation.
content.summary: May 98/99 dark blue cylinder over lake huron
Sighting in quincy florida march 2001
Blue/white light

content.detailedDescription: I was in my yard as we live in a rual area, and we enjoy looking at the stars.Mywife and i enjoy the evening stars.We thought it was a military aircraft, but myhusband built air craft, and said that is not one of ours, uncluding area 51 spc5clong5crange5chyperdrtive
content.summary: Triangular shaped vechicle well lighted below no s
I think i was the subject of some abduction.
Soundless craft in the skys in oklahoma
5 lights shaped as the letter t.  powerful engine

content.detailedDescription: Witness sees bright yellow light in sky (ese).  thought it might be landinglight of a plane.  two other lights were by it, one on each side.  these lightswere much smaller.  it was at this time the witness felt fear.  she saw theyellow light had streaks of red going through it.  she felt it was a ufo.  thelight was a bright lemon yellow, and quite large, with red going through it frommoment to moment.  at this time the witness felt a strong sense of fear takeover again.  the lights were a pure color with no glare to them, they seemed tobe glowing from within.  witness says she lost all fear as she watched the twosmaller lights on the sides strobe in unison, the green one on the left as shelooked up and the white one one the right.  the witness measured the largerlights with her fingers at arms length - approximately  3 inches.  the lightspassed over the roof of her house and she couldnt see the outline of anythingsolid.  there was no sound as they went over.
content.summary: Bright lights seen in marlette, michigan
Black diamond-shaped object w/three bright white l

content.detailedDescription: This petroglyph is at the site inyo-25 at the terminal end of avolcanic(basaltic) flow, at the se. end of little lake (the lake) proper, in theowens valley, of ca. it is approx 30 above the ground, slightly n. of the mostpromenent point of the flow. i can supply a topo, and mark the exact spot. thepatina is ancient, but i chalked it, for photos. access must be secured. i willans. all questions. sincerely3b henry h. helene
content.summary: Found a petroglyph of what must a ufo.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 9:00pm.  my band had just come out of our practice place, and webegan talking, winding down from playing.  my bass player then stated, what thehell is that rather calmly.  myself, the other three band members, my wife andtwo children saw three glowing lights, in a triangular formation, above it was atriangular shaped object.  it was not illuminated in any way.  it also madeabsolutely no sound.  the three objects moved in a circle around the object, andat one point moved so abruptly, i thought the object was moving back toward us,but it kept moving away.  i at first thought it was a low flying plane, but onceagain, there was dead silence.  as the object moved away from us it just kind ofpopped out of sight, it did not pass over and fade away in the distance, it justdisappeared after moving about 100 yards away.
content.summary: 3 lights

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from celebrating a late family xmas, i was southbound on ih-35 justbetween georgetown and round rock, tx. within an hour of sunset, a largethunderhead was forming west of town that stretched high into the sky, blockingthe sun. there was what seemed like a very unnatural light everywhere from theclouds blocking the sun, but the light refracted around the cloud creating thiseffect.  suddenly i saw what appeared to be a cylindrical object, opaque incolor floating a mile or so away. it was very large and tilted at an angle ofapproximately 60 degrees. the object traveled nxne very slowly and at the exactelevation the entire time. i could see definition of shape, but could seethrough the object barely, almost like tinted glass. the sun dipped furtherbehind the clouds, the light changed and the object disappeared. i tracked theobject from directly in front of my car to almost perpendicular to the vehiclespassenger window. i tried to wake my son to show him but he did not awaken intime.
content.summary: Flying object, opaque coloration, large size, unk

content.detailedDescription: We were camping out on the beach in perdido key fl. looking east to pensacolanas we saw a bluish green light that looked like it could have been a nav lighton an aircraft. but it was maneuvering in such a manner that it was nothingconventional. no jets were in the area or any other aircraft lights. it apearedright around the light house on nas. we could see a sillouette of the tree linebeyond a treeline that was in fgront of us and it would dip below the fartreeline over the intercoastal waterway. it was probably a terrestrial madeobject given its proximity of nas. it did exibit anti-grav characteristicsthough. appeared to land 2 during 30 min . we couldnt believe it.
content.summary: Small bluish-green light making zig-zag-stop maneu
Green object with bluish "propulsion system" stuns

content.detailedDescription: My date and i were heading to vegas driveing north bound on interstate 15 aboutone and a half miles befor oak hill rd. (cajon summit) when from out of thenorth droping out below the cloud celing was what i thought was a aircraft.Almost at the same time we saw comeing out of the west object #2. a blue-whitepin point. i said those planes are going hit each other. with a flash ofred-orange light  thay joind into one. after 2 or 3 seconds thay seprated backinto 2 with onther flash of light. the blue-white pin point seemed to fade awayinto nothing while it went back the way it came from. at the same time object #1is getting brighter and brighter with an ice cream cone structuer clearlyvisable. and then all at once it blinks out and is gone. total time about 30 to35 seconds.  wow!!!!
content.summary: Those planes are going hit each other

content.detailedDescription: It happened when i was playing pool at friend house.  relatives of my friendwere outside and told us tocome out a look outside.  when i looked up i sawabrilliant flourescent orange light moving towardus at a very slow speed.  it wasabout 5 miles awayand moving toward our direction at about 2 thousand feetabove.  as slowly moved toward where we were (withinabout a 1/4 mile.  i noticedit didnt have any sound to iteven though it exibited amazing characteristics. it started to glowviolently brighter and brighter.  it driped somethingon fire(molten metal?) that burnt out before it reached the ground.  it slowly startedto climb in altitude.Then all the sudden it shot straigt up at faster thanlightspeed.  a few years later in arizona i saw what appearedto be the sameobject being escorted by 2 military helicopterswith their lights out.
content.summary: Saw orange ufo travel faster than speed of light

content.detailedDescription: 4-4-01mufonclover sightingtrianglethis is a follow up to the posting i did yesterday, i finally got to talk to oneof thewitnesses that were on the scene.  this was a female deputy that first saw  thecraft out ofthe passengers window of the police vehicle.  it was about 8:30 pm and they(there weretwo other officers , one in her car and one in another car behind them) werereturningfrom a call.  an elderly couple had complained about someone parking by theirmagnoliatree.  they found nothing there and the ground was muddy(no tire tracks), aftertalkingwith her she feels that it is possible the couple saw the lights from what theysaw a fewminutes later.  on their way back she saw bright lights coming  towards themover thetrees, this would have been from the east from the direction of the power plant.The lightswere moving very slowly, and at this time the officer in the car behind themradioed, doyou guys see that or some thing to that effect.  it came right up to the roadwhere theywere at tree top level, at about this time they stopped in the road.  the craftalso stoppedthere for a moment.  she said it was hard to make out the shape because thelights were sobright, but said it was a dark triangle shape with a light in each cornerpointing ahead of it. she had a hard time determining its size because the lights were so bright butfelt it was atleast as big as a small house.  it then banked and did a slow turn and wentback the wayit had came towards the power plant.  they said it made no sound and they hadcut theircars off.   next they had to get on another road to follow it and lost sight of it severaltimes.  theywent to the power plant up a back road and spotted it .  it was now much higherin the sky(the smoke stack is 500 feet and it was  much higher than that)  and moving awayfromthem, back the way they had just come from.  it had now taken on the appearanceof abright starand seemed to disappear then reappear in different areas of thesky.  at thistime the female deputy got out her department issue 35mm camera and startedsnappingpictures.  she said her flash was on and that every time she snapped a picturethe thingwould shut its lights off, then turn them back on.  at this time it was only abright light inthe sky and that is what she felt her pictures would look like if they turn out;(as of todaythey have not been developed) she did say she would give us some if they turnout. itcontinued to move away until it just disappeared.  the whole event lasted aboutone hourfrom when they first saw the lights to when it was gone.  at the power plantthey werejoined by a fourth deputy and an animal control warden.  they also talked topeople at thepower plant and they saw and heard nothing.  the deputy i talked to said she sawthesame light in the sky the next evening, (its bright star like form) but nothingsince then.  istill hope to talk to at least one of the other deputies. the deputy i talked totoday said shewould draw some pictures of what she saw.  i will update as i gain moreinformation.Tom ginther va mufon
content.summary: Triangle sighting

content.detailedDescription: It was a beuatiful day, early afternoon in amsterdam. weather was quite abnormalfor this time of year usually cloudy, overcast and full of rain, but therewasnt a cloud in the sky. two business associates of mine and i were lying onthe 35 degree slope of an isoceles triangle covered with grass overlooking thelarge park that borders the rijksmuseum, van gogh and stedelijk museums. we werewatching children play football (soccer), dogs chase frisbees, school girlslaugh and play - and up in the sky commercial airliners fly left and right. theywere at cruising altitude and i was watching a 747 with four very distinct vaportrails, two behind either wing, flying south when my associate scott yelled heydaniels, whats that?! and he pointed to what was without doubt a flying saucer.Flying twice as fast as the 747 at a lower altitude (perhaps 20000 feet) with arelative diameter
content.summary: Flying saucer over beautiful amsterdam

content.detailedDescription: First let me state that this investigation is just starting, but i thoughtsomeone may be interested in what is known now. ( i will be out of town for thenext week)  john love emailed me about this sighting, it was reported on anotherweb-site by someone who overheard parts of conversations about this but did nothave all of the facts right.  i talked to people that live in clover, one aboutone mile from the site and no one had heard about it, this was two weeks afterthe event.  i then called the halifax county shreiffs office and talked to thesheriff.  he was very forth coming in telling me what his deputies had seen andatleast one of them was in the room with him.  on march 8 at about 8pm? two orthree were on an unrelated call in the area of the power plant, the third mayhave joined the group a few minutes later.  (it was reported that the powerplant had called in the first web-site  report)  they saw a triangle or pyraimidshaped object above the clover power plant at about the height of the smokestack (500 feet), it was lit up on all three corners, and made no sound theycould hear above the hum of the power plant.  they said it "banked" around thearea of the plant.  they were later joined by a fourth officier from thesheriffs office and an animal control warden.  they attempted to take picturesbut none turned out.  they also said that when the flash of the camera went off,the lights on the craft went off.  the other site also talked about the deputiesbeing traumatized, the sheriff laughed when i told him that and said they were alittle moved by the event.  at this time it appears that personnel inside thepower plant were not aware of the event at the time it was taking place.  i alsotalked to a woman i work with and she said that her two cousins live in thatarea and saw the craft on that night, they told her that it was a diamond shapeand "all lit up."
content.summary: Triangle sighting
Sighting of ufo/ airliner encounter

content.detailedDescription: (you can type over theseinstructions.)please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). i was walking westward on cortland which is a road situated on the southside of a half-wild hill of grass called bernal heights.The library had justclosed and the sky was dark.I just finished looking at some books at that samelibrary,in san francisco (city-county).I was feeling bored so started looking atcelestial objects(as i was ambulating downhill,westward),and noted that betweenvenus in the west and jupiter(near middle of sky) a intense white-light about asluminous as venus just showed up.I just noticed it hovering there for about 25seconds,first in awe,then in some dread.This phenomena was roughly in the middlebetween the two planets mentioned,this paragraph.It then just blinked/winkedout.Later thinking about it i called an observatory and asked if iridium flarescould hover.They responded in the negative.Pls.Let me know if you identifiedit.(an iridium flare-neither iridium nor flare-is part of the satillite systemfor cell phones.It flares up when a solar panel is oriented toward the sun.)s/ak
content.summary: Intense white light hovering at night in jan,2001,

content.detailedDescription: I aws walking my dogs the evening of march 25, 2001 @2315 hrs. when i heard astrange sound which i really could not identify.  then suddenly i saw a ship flyover me coming from the west and traveling east toward binghamton ny.  theheight of the flight appeared to be between 200 to 300 ft above the hill i wason. my larger dog became very curious. it appear that the craft had a shortfuselage and the wings were almost triangular.  the total wing areas were lit upin a beige like light.  not normal for commercial aircraft. the speed of thecraft was slow. it appeared to be traveling under 100 mph.  craft of that sizewould have to travel faster even worth flaps down. i have remained very curiousabout this.  there are 2 airports in close proximity, however, both were closedthat evening.Please contact me fpr more info. if you need me.
content.summary: 11:15 pm saw low flying object going east.
